name: Atelier Agnes
description:
"Agnes Lavlie" is a girl-chemist running her business in the suburbs of the Trading City.

Even though she lost her parents in her childhood, she still lived modestly with her younger sister, Lufa, at her grandmother's house, who appeared to be an alchemist. She couldn't stop worrying about her sister who was suffering from a weird disease called "Sleeping Beauty"; A disease that makes her sleep for most of the day.
